availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron C. Higgason (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Thompson Higgason. Father of Loies A. "Louisa" Higgason, Lucy Leora Higgason, David Higgason, Estelle Higgason, Frances Higgason, Micajah Higgason, and Nancy Higgason. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 87B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 599.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 75B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 466A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
"Aaron Christmas Higgason (1824-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial 78186536, accessed February 10, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/78186536.
